channel.title: Nexus | 2 worlds pk&eco | VPS hosted | UPDATED POST
channel.description:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/IUDC8Sp.png[/img] [url=http://"http://nexus.webrpg.ca/"]Nexus Forums[/url] Manager of Nexus PK: Elf
Manager of Nexus Eco: Marius
~~~Client Download link~~~ Nexus Client Download [[url=http://"https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/82431811/Nexus%20Client.jar"]Click HERE[/url]]
Hiring Staff Members!
~~~ STAFF ~~~ Note: WE ARE CURRENTLY LOOKING FOR NEW STAFF MEMBERS! DO NOT ASK FOR A STAFF SPOT IN-GAME Apply after becoming a Member for In-game coins
~~~Info & Features~~~ Nexus has Weekly in-game Updates.
~~~ PK WORLD ~~~
::master ::Pure ::setlevel (id or name) level ::commands Preset banks with over 200+ items Commands for Preset gear and items such as Zerk, Pure, Barrows Pking Teleports and MUCH MORE!
~~~ Server Features ~~~ Regular Member Status (bought with coins in-game) TONS of in-game ranks for players Grand Exchange for Members+ Maxed Cape & Tok-haar PK World & Eco World Weekly Events | Double Exp| Triple PKP (Pk Points) | Drop partys | PKing championships Colored whips with NPC Kills required and bonuses Perfect NPC Combat & PVP Combat Dragon Pickaxe In-game member credits (10 credits = 10Mil) Dragon armour (or & sp) Drop partyroom Working Torva and virtus (HP boost) X-Mas Events & Halloween Events Friends chat Duel Arena, with staking Banking with Item searching. All Skills working 100% Top 10 PK leaderboards with kill/death Custom Rank Icons, Username & Loyalty Title Ancient curses
~BOSSES~ Godwars King black dragon Chaos elemental Tormented demons Metal Dragons (Bronze, Iron, Steel, mithril) Corp Beast Nomad Bork Avatars Jad And WAY MORE!!! We add NEW Bosses every week!
~~~PK world media~~~ Pre-set bank [img]http://i62.tinypic.com/1552v4w.png[/img]
Altars at home [img]http://i62.tinypic.com/xlgwmx.png[/img] Leaderboards [img]http://i60.tinypic.com/11m9gup.png[/img] PK teleports [img]http://i59.tinypic.com/ebamwg.png[/img] Shops [img]http://i60.tinypic.com/xlxbn9.png[/img]
Special Attacks [img]http://i.imgur.com/6nE8TD0.png[/img] ~~~ECO world media~~~
Having problems? go on the forums for some help.

item.title: Nexus | 2 worlds pk&eco | VPS hosted | UPDATED POST
item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc
item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

Soulcist:

This looks REALLY basic and from the looks of it - nothing unique. If you have something to show off then I’d probably take the chance to take some nice media for your thread and hope that it attracts a lot more.

I agree, there isn’t anything original or anything that shouldn’t already be in a server. Almost 98% of the servers now just seem the same old stuff. Oh well :S

Read full topic
item.source: Nexus | 2 worlds pk&eco | VPS hosted | UPDATED POST
